snippet: A former Army soldier accused of sprinting across the White House lawn and into the executive mansion was heavily armed when he was arrested by Virginia state troopers after a traffic stop in July....

headline.print_headline: Accused White House Intruder Armed in July Arrest
headline.main: Accused White House Intruder Armed in July Arrest

lead_paragraph: A former Army soldier accused of sprinting across the White House lawn and into the executive mansion was heavily armed when he was arrested by Virginia state troopers after a traffic stop in July.
